snippet: The United States said on Wednesday new military incursions on Ukraine's eastern border indicate a Russian-directed counteroffensive is likely underway in two Ukrainian towns....

headline.print_headline: U.S. Says Russian-Directed Counteroffensive in Ukraine Cities Likely Underway
headline.main: U.S. Says Russian-Directed Counteroffensive in Ukraine Cities Likely Underway

lead_paragraph: The United States said on Wednesday new military incursions on Ukraine's eastern border indicate a Russian-directed counteroffensive is likely underway in two Ukrainian towns.
